title: How to Pack Vinyl Records for Shipping

steps.title: Cross
steps.content: Cross two pieces of bubble wrap that are as wide as the records and three and a half times as long. Put 20-22 records on top of the center, where the two pieces of bubble wrap cross. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Fold
steps.content: Fold the bubble wrap over the records and secure with tape. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Cut
steps.content: Cut four pieces of cardboard approximately 4" x 6" (10cm x 15 cm). Fold them twice and tape the ends together to make four sturdy corner protections.

steps.title: Place
steps.content: Place the bubble-wrapped records into the record mailer and insert the four protective corners. Corner detail:

steps.title: Fill in
steps.content: Fill in the extra space with newspaper.

steps.title: Close
steps.content: Close the record mailer and secure it with a generous amount of tape. [3] X Research source
